course_description: An introductory course in the theory of Computer Science, focusing on analysis of discrete structures with applications. Emphasis is on developing familiarity with notation, computational acuity and creative problem solving skills.
prerequisites: (CS 170 or CS_OX 170) and (MATH 111 or MATH_OX 111) or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisites.
